mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (userName, PID, gender, telephone, address, imageUrl, role, account, password, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{pid}, #{gender}, #{telephone}, #{address}, #{imageurl}, #{role}, #{account}, #{password}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select * from userinfo
and userName like concat('%', #{customerQueryDTO.username}, '%')
and PID like concat('%', #{customerQueryDTO.pid}, '%')
and gender like concat('%', #{customerQueryDTO.gender}, '%')
and account like concat('%', #{customerQueryDTO.account}, '%')
and role like concat('%', #{customerQueryDTO.role}, '%')
and create_time >= #{beginDateTime}
and create_time <= #{endDateTime}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
